text: @NYGovCuomo Will @NYSLabor be returning the Pandemic Unemployment Assistance #funds they've blocked with #forfeitdays over the past 8 weeks? The State Govt shd support its citizens, not steal from them! #waiveforfeitdays #coronavirus @NYGovCuomo @AOC @NYSDOLCommish @nytimes @washingtonpost
